parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain where you want to update a domain unit.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain unit that you want to update.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time stamp at which the domain unit that you want to update was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the domain unit that you want to update.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the domain unit that you want to update.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain where you want to update the domain unit.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit that you want to update.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the domain unit was last updated.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last updated the domain unit.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the domain unit that you want to update.

nested_items.name: owners
nested_items.description: The owners of the domain unit that you want to update.

nested_items.name: groupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit group.

nested_items.name: userId
nested_items.description: The ID of teh domain unit user.

nested_items.name: parentDomainUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the parent domain unit.
